Translations.Text: DI controls NOKT TAG. This est lecion those posed okul
Di kre cxiu viv creature el akv! Kelk da them marsx their bellies kelk marsx 2 krur kelk marsx 4. DI KRE whatever LI VOL. DI est Omnipotent
(Ni send vi clarifying revelations tiam DI direkt whoever vol direkt) rekt path
Ili dir Ni kred en DI messenger ni obe tiam kelk da them slide dors afterwards! These est believers
When ili invit DI His messenger jugx them kelk da them renvers
Se judgment est their komplez ili readily akcept gxi
est tie disease their kor? Est ili doubtful? Est ili afraid ti DI His messenger trakt them unfairly? En fakt, est ili est unjust
Nur utterance believers whenever invit DI His messenger jugx their afer est dir Ni auxd ni obe. These est winners
Those obe DI His messenger reverence DI observ Him these est triumphant unu
Ili jxur DI solemnly vi komand them mobilize ili mobilize! dir ne jxur. Obedience est obligation. DI EST fully Cognizant DE CXIO VI do
